name: The Market Crash
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce vermouth bianco (or substitute sweet vermouth)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add all ingredients except pomegranate seeds and mint leaf. Stir rapidly until outside of shaker is frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with pomegranate seeds and mint.
